amendment.description: To require a report on the discharge by warrant officers of pilot and other flight officer positions in the Navy, Marine Corps, and Air Force currently discharged by commissioned officers.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4169 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 4169 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Coats.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4169 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4169 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Coats.
